Uses of Package
sheep.collision

Packages that use sheep.collision
sheep.collision Contains classes for collision detection, spatial partitioning and interfaces for collision events. 
sheep.game Contains classes related to game logic. 
 

Classes in sheep.collision used by sheep.collision
Interval
          Contains an interval used in the collision detection algortihm.
Polygon
          An implementation of the Shape class for general convex polygons.
QuadTree
          A QuadTree is a way of dividing the game scene into quadrants recursively.
Shape
          An abstraction over all shapes in the collision detection system.
Spatial
          Interface for all spatial partitioning structures.
SpatialVisitor
          In order to create objects which can visit sprites contained in spatial partitioners, their corresponding classes much implement this interface.
 

Classes in sheep.collision used by sheep.game
CollisionListener
          Classes that want to be able to listen for collision events on a certain sprite must implement this interface.
Shape
          An abstraction over all shapes in the collision detection system.
